snippet.title: Epoch Cassette Vision - #3  Galaxian - 1981 (GamePlay)
snippet.description:
Gameplay of the game Galaxian for the Epoch Cassette Vision.


For Information, the game is actually a port of Moon Cresta, an arcadegame released in 1980 by Nichibutsu. 

For a more in depth review, please visit : https://www.facebook.com/VideoGameKraken/posts/2275947899089676

If you want to join the discussion on Obscure Video Game & Console, join our group at: https://www.facebook.com/groups/451508825233265/
